short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A clean, distraction-free notebook with rich text, shortcuts, auto-save, customizations, and themes to keep your ideas organized.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Your words are saved as you type by your browser, so no account is needed! 🔄

✨  Format text (bold, italics, lists, headings) with keyboard shortcuts.
📑  Multiple notes and drag and drop reordering of notes.
✂️  Copied text from websites and other sources will be neatly formatted.
📝  Export your notes to HTML, Markdown or plain text.
🔍  Customize fonts and adjust zoom preferences.
🌓  Toggle between Dark and Light theme modes.

Make the Most of It:
👉 In the settings, you can change the font type and size, set the writing area to full width or centered, and enable spelling suggestions.
👉 To import your existing notes, simply drag and drop text, markdown or HTML files into the app.

Got an idea... 💡 just write it down! 

Happy typing!
